Name: ORC-mkX Arms Singularity
Description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%
Carrying Capacity: 10K SP
Temp. Rating: -61 / 91 °C

The mark X is the latest in CDS’ award-winning Omni-Role Combat armor series. This EVA-rated suit features new EdgeCore composite weave technology that maximizes protection against projectiles, explosives and the elements without hindering the operator's agility.
